usas adhyapana kshethraye mathuwa athi gatalu soya balima sandaha janadhipathi komisan sabhawak path kirimata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha upades di atha.wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge gatalu sambandhayen sakachja kirima sandaha siya pradhanathwayen pereda pawathi hamuwedi kamitu samajikayan amatha janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahatha me bawa anawaranaya kara thibe.mema komisan sabhawa kadinamin path kara wishwawidyalawala pawathna gatalu pilibadawa soya balana bawada lekamwaraya aacharyawarunta danwa thibe.thama gatalu sambandhayen janadhipathi lekamwarayage madihathwima mithrashili ha suhada praweshayak gath bawath me nisa ma gatalu wisada ganimata thamanta hakiyawa labenu athi bawath wishwawidyala aacharyawarunge samithi sammelanaye lekam aacharya terans madujith dinamina ta pawasiya.mema komisama mangin aacharyawarunge gatalu wisandimata kalayak gatha wana bawin ema gatalu wisandimata ketikalina piyawarak gannayi mehidi aacharyawarun illimak kara atha.min pera aacharyawarun lekamwarayata laba di athi yojanamalawa sambandhayen thawa duratath adhyayanaya kirimata awashya bawada ee sandaha thawath dina kihipayak awashya bawada lekamwaraya aacharyawarunta danwa atha.mema sakachchawata usas adhyapana amathyanshaye lekam aacharya sunil jayantha nawarathna, wishwawidyala prathipadana komisan sabhawe upa sabhapathiwaraya athulu pirisak sahabhagi wi atha.watup wadi kara ganima athulu karunu kihipayak mul kara ganimin wishwawidyala aacharyawarun me dinawala kriyathmaka kara athi wadawarjanaya hethuwen me wana wita wishwawidyala katayuthu sampurnayen nathara wi thibe.kamituwa labana sathiye di yali raswimata niyamithaya.¬†.

nawina pahasukam sahithawa idikara athi mema godanagilla sandaha rupiyal miliyana 740k waya kara athi athara eya warga adi 74000ka wishalathwayakin yukthaya.nawa godanagille koshtagara thula drrushya pata, widyuth lekhana, sithiyam, pramanayen wishala lekhana ha adhilekhana thanpath kirimata sudusu awakashath eewa parishilanaya kirimata pahasukamuth salasa athi athara aasana 302kin yuth shrawanagarayak da ehi idikara thibe.lekhana thanpath kirimata uchitha parisarika thaththwayan sakasimata ehi ushnathwaya, sapeksha aardrathawa saha aalokaya palanaya kirimata haki lesa nirmanaya kara athi godanagilla swabhawika aalokaya laba ganima, haritha pahaya aaraksha kirima, wasi jalaya prayojanayata ganima, surya shakthiya labaganima aadi suwisheshathawalin samanwithaya.dutugamunu rajathumage namaya ithihasayen maka damannata samaharu katayuthu kala bawath ee kalaye dutugamunu rajuge nama kiyannatath biya wu bawath janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.jathika urumayan pilibanda amathi aacharya jagath balasuriya mahatha saha jathika lekhanarakshaka departhamenthuwe adhyaksha aacharya sarojini weththasinha mahathmiya da adahas dakwuha.
